name: report
description: Generates a price report for assets.

symbol.name: symbol
symbol.description: Get a detailed report for a single asset.

symbol.name: symbol
symbol.description: The symbol or name of the asset to query.

range.name: range
range.description: The time range to query (e.g., 7d, 2w, 1m, 6h, defaults to 7d).

list.name: list
list.description: List all queryable assets and their latest prices.

responses.list_footer: If the update time is more than `5` minutes ago, there might be an issue with the bot. Please check for announcements.
responses.invalid_range: Invalid time range. Please use a format like 7d, 2w, 1m, or a preset value.
responses.no_data: No data found for symbol `{{symbol}}` in the selected time range.
responses.error_fetching: An error occurred while fetching the report.
